item.title: SONIM TECHNOLOGIES INC 10-K
item.description: SONIM TECHNOLOGIES INC, which is in the Telephone & Telegraph Apparatus [3661] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 21, 2022 had 33602 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
